name: Too Fast!
description:
Fly on a hoverboard, on the run from a mysterious creature hunting you down! Just make sure to avoid the obstacles, not to slide off the board, not to go too slowly, and... you know what, just keep going forward, I'm sure you'll be fine.

Made with Raylib: www.raylib.com

Uses rlpbr - Not-Nik/rlpbr: rlpbr is an easy-to-use library for PBR material rendering in raylib (github.com)
